articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Trump cuts ties with Marjorie Taylor Greene, once among his top MAGA-world defenders - NPR
articles.description: The dismissal of Greene — once the epitome of "Make America Great Again"  — appeared to be the final break in a dispute simmering for months.
articles.content: President Donald Trump has publicly called it quits with one of his most stalwart MAGA-world supporters, calling Georgia Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene "'Wacky' Marjorie" and saying he would endorse a c… [+4374 chars]
